Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

xlcutter (development version)

  • xlsx_cutter() internal loop won’t be interrupted in case a file can’t be parsed. This avoid loosing potentially hours of computation when one of the last files fails and made the entire function crash. All parsing issues are now returned as warnings at the end (#13, @Bisaloo).

xlcutter 0.1.1

CRAN release: 2023-10-22

  • xlsx_cutter() no longer fails when reading excel files with comments on blank cells (#14, @Bisaloo).

xlcutter 0.1.0

CRAN release: 2023-05-30

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.
